item.title: Hilton shares fall after DHS says Minneapolis hotel canceled reservation due to immigration enforcement
item.description: "We are not allowing any ICE or immigration agents to stay at our property," an email cited by DHS said.

item.title: Venezuela chaos could lead to billions in investment opportunities, one consultant says
item.description: One firm says there could be $500 billion in opportunities in Venezuela over the next 10 years.

item.title: Maduro says he was 'kidnapped' and is 'prisoner of war' in New York court, pleads not guilty
item.description: Nicolas Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, were captured on Saturday by U.S. forces in Venezuela on the orders of President Donald Trump.

item.title: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz drops reelection bid amid state fraud scandal scrutiny
item.description: President Donald Trump has responded to the Minnesota fraud reports with anti-Somali rhetoric and renewed attacks against Democratic Rep. Ilhan Omar.

item.title: Pentagon to cut Sen. Mark Kelly's military retirement pay over 'seditious' video: Hegseth
item.description: Sen. Mark Kelly and other members of Congress on the video reminded members of the U.S. military that they can refuse to follow illegal orders.
